name: Wolf or Boy
description:
Wolf or Boy　is a simulation that allows you to experience a psychological battle between a person and Werewolfs.
A player visited a village somewhere. Because he or she heard the rumor of a horrible affair.
Apparently, among the villagers, it seems that Werewolfs are mixed in ...
"Reveal and kill our enemies!"
"We eat all of you!"
Who is your ally? Who is the enemy?
A player is going to fight a fierce psychological battle with a reliable partner.
You have to win, by making your only buddy and leveraging his abilities.Feature of this game
  • This game is based on the popular table game "Are You a Werewolf?"
